news.title: MPs back assisted dying bill in historic Commons vote
news.summary: The bill would allow terminally ill adults in England and Wales to end their own lives.

news.title: How did my MP vote on assisted dying?
news.summary: Check whether your MP voted for or against the assisted dying bill.

news.title: Palestine Action to be banned after activists break into RAF base
news.summary: The home secretary will move to proscribe the Palestine Action group in the coming weeks, the BBC understands

news.title: Doctors told her she should not play football. Now she's England's goalkeeper
news.summary: Hannah Hampton on overcoming a serious eye condition to rise to become England's number one goalkeeper at Euro 2025.

news.title: River Island set to close 33 shops, putting hundreds of jobs at risk
news.summary: The retailer blames the rise of online shopping for its decision, which risks hundreds of jobs.

news.title: Woman charged with murdering sister in missing Rolex case
news.summary: A 69-year-old woman appeared before Highbury Magistrates' Court and was remanded into custody.

news.title: Labour to shift council funding to poorer areas
news.summary: Ministers say current funding rules fail to account for higher service costs in more deprived places.

news.title: BBC shelves Gaza documentary over impartiality concerns
news.summary: Gaza: Doctors Under Attack, which was due to air in February, was made by an independent company.

news.title: Seven arrested after assault outside Iranian embassy in London
news.summary: The altercation involved protesters supporting and opposing the Iranian monarchy, police believe.

news.title: Yellow storm warning issued as UK heatwave intensifies
news.summary: Hot, dry conditions are set to persist, with temperatures going as high as 32C in central England.
